newsitem.title: USA: Borland expects loss for fiscal third quarter.
newsitem.headline: Borland expects loss for fiscal third quarter.

text.p: Software company Borland International Inc. said Wednesday it expected to report an operating loss for the current quarter.

The company said it expected a loss of 52 cents to 62 cents a share on revenues of $33 million to $36 million for its fiscal third quarter ending Dec. 31. In the same quarter a year ago, Borland reported a profit of $849,000, or 3 cents per share, on revenues of $47.3 million.
Borland attributed the loss to not shipping any new products in the quarter and slowing sales of existing, mature products as customers anticipate upcoming and previously announced product releases.
